metadata.name: McCandless & Company
metadata.description: From the creator of Zombie-Proof and co-writer of 24 and Stargate Atlantis and the artist of the critically acclaimed indie Tales of the Cherokee comes this story of two private detectives from two very different walks of life, Carey McCandless and Jessica Williams. Along with their only employee, would-be writer David Bradshaw, they investigate the surprisingly deadly and certainly contemporary theft of $60 million from a mutual fund. A complete 48-page crime noir graphic novel in glorious B&W.
